data.message: There is too much advertising on Facebook ..how do I stop them from showing up on my page ?

replies.message: Hey Truman. Ads help keep Facebook free and we strive to only show ads that are relevant and interesting to you. If you don't want to see a specific ad, you can click the x on the top right corner of the ad and choose hide. This will ensure that you no longer see this ad in your News Feed. -Jenny
I have been trying to get rid of the skinny pill ads for weeks but you hide one and it just comes back on another.  I am hiding it from a different advertiser on a daily basis. So annoying.
Why do I get an ad for lawncare from a company out of state? None of the ads thus far are relevant to me or even my city.
Going to hop on this boat too, i don't need to see ads from wal mart. i am well aware they exist and i'm pretty sure everyone with an internet connection, cell phone etc... does as well.
